metadata.name: Food Plant Source Peach Prunus persica 0 1 g 1mL Injection solution

clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: For the treatment of Pneumococcal pneumonia due to susceptible strains and group A beta hemolytic streptococcal infections of the upper respiratory tract

contraindications.disease: Symptoms of overdose include diarrhea nausea stomach cramps and vomiting
contraindications.pharmacodynamics: Troleandomycin is a macrolide antibiotic that is similar to erythromycin It is active in vitro against the following gram positive organisms Streptococcus pyogenes and Diplococcus pneumoniae
